# Area circulo

```{r}
r <- 0.5
area <- pi * r ^ 2

```

# Area cuadrado

```{r}
lado <- 3
areacuadrado <- lado ^ 2

```

# Area triangulo

```{r}
base <- 3
h <- 4
areatriangulo <- base*h /2

```

# Area rectangulo

```{r}
base <- 3
h <- 4
areatriangulo <- base*h

```

# Area trapecio

```{r}
b <- 3
B <- 2
H <- 4
areatriangulo <- (b+B)*H/2

```
